::Slayer::

Slayer growls, standing up. The traders wern't responding. It was time 
to go to plan B, although the trading idea was still open if anyone 
was willing to trade.

"The traders arn't responding," he says over the comm to his teammate, 
"We can try to contact another faction for trading, or we can capture 
the Maximals. Either one would probably work."
